mapper.insert: INSERT INTO transaction(a_id, account_number, balance, transaction_date, transaction_type, transaction_amount, description) VALUES(#{a_id}, #{account_number}, #{balance}, #{transaction_date}, #{transaction_type}, #{transaction_amount}, #{description})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM transaction ORDER BY transaction_date

SELECT t.transaction_date, a.account_number, t.transaction_type, t.transaction_amount, t.balance, t.description FROM transaction t JOIN accounts a ON t.a_id = a.a_id WHERE t.a_id = #{a_id} ORDER BY t.a_id
